history.content:
Join the 3D Modeling / Animation Decal!

Have you ever wanted to make 3D animation, but don’t know where to begin? If so, come join the UCBUGG 3D Modeling and Animation DeCal, and we’ll give you all the help you need to make your very own short film! Students explore every aspect of the production process, from storyboarding to 3D modeling, shading, rigging, animation, VFX, and more to create their very own animated short film. No experience is necessary! Come to one of our info sessions on Monday, January 24 and Thursday, January 27th from 7-9pm PST to learn more.

[IMPORTANT] If you are interested in attending, please fill out the following form so we can get the Zoom link to you: https://forms.gle/F3tERkD8SqiM4H9B7

Learn more about us at http://www.ucbugg.com/static/index.html
